definition: Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan

sentences.english: The causeway, finished just 10 years ago, has won engineering awards.
sentences.chinese: 銅鑼灣在10年前竣工，獲得了工程獎。

sentences.english: Causeway Bay Animal Hospital, 29 Whitfield Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 銅鑼灣動物醫院，香港銅鑼灣威菲路道29號。

sentences.english: Causeway Bay Animal Hospital, 29 Whitfield Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 銅鑼灣動物醫院，香港銅鑼灣威菲路道29號。

sentences.english: Even if I go to Causeway Bay, reporters follow me.
sentences.chinese: 甚至我去銅鑼灣時，記者也會跟蹤我。

sentences.english: Only could be collected at red-dots causeway bay service centre .
sentences.chinese: 只接受銅鑼灣點點紅服務中心作交收。

sentences.english: I loved SoGo, the Japanese dept store in Causeway Bay.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡銅鑼灣的崇光日本百貨。

sentences.english: Room 1704, Hang Lung Centre, Paterson Srteet, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 香港銅鑼灣百德新街恆隆中心1704室。

sentences.english: The shopping areas of Wan Chai and Causeway Bay are all within walking distances.
sentences.chinese: 灣仔購物區和銅鑼灣都只有步行距離。

sentences.english: Gongs rang out suddenly in the village, but no one knew what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 村子裏突然響起了銅鑼聲，不知道出了什麼事情。

sentences.english: For computers, go to Windsor House shopping center in Causeway Bay.
sentences.chinese: 買電腦可以去銅鑼灣的皇室大廈購物中心。

sentences.english: Goes to the barbarous clangour of a gong.
sentences.chinese: 踩踏着一面銅鑼的野蠻的鏗鏘節拍。

sentences.english: Have a good time in Causeuay bay business plaza.
sentences.chinese: 祝您在銅鑼灣商業廣場購物愉快。

sentences.english: What is the big brass gong and hammer for?
sentences.chinese: 那個大銅鑼和錘子是幹什麼用的？

sentences.english: Pet Story Veterinary Clinic, 2/F, 458 Lock Hart Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 反斗寵物診所，香港銅鑼灣駱克道458號2樓。

sentences.english: Located in the center of Causeway Bay, it is the most convenient hideaway from this hectic city.
sentences.chinese: 位於銅鑼灣的心臟地帶，是鬧市中偷閒的最好去處。

sentences.english: Central Animal Hospital, G/F, 100 Hing Fat Street, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 中央動物醫院，香港銅鑼灣興發街100號地下。

definition: variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
(of sound) to never stop/to fall incessantly on the ear/to linger on
administrative enclave/land of one country enclosed within another/a salient
to sound a bell/(of a clock) to chime
the feeling of actually being there
to roll/(to do sth) in a loop/to scroll (computing)/to progressively expand (economics)/to rumble (of thunder)
